item.text: Specify the additional HCPC codes being requested:

Diagnostic imaging study confirms compression or displacement of the corresponding nerve root by a facet joint synovial cyst AND pt has documented clinical and physical symptoms related to synovial facet cyst:

If diagnostic is this the first or second injection?

Procedure reports validate that if prior auth approved, the patient will/has received no more than four (4) therapeutic facet joint (IA) in the current rolling 12 months, including the one being requested?

item.text: Does the patient record reflect accurate/active ICD10 codes, eg., old diagnosis(es) have been coded to 'history of' if no longer active/being treated?

Non-facet pathology per clinical assessment or diagnostic studies has ruled out other sources of the patient's pain, including but not limited to fractures, tumors, infections or significant deformity.

valueCoding.code: Negative for non-facet pathology sources.  Medical record indicates all of the following are ABSENT: active spine fractures, spine tumors, active infections, sciatica, hip osteoarthritis, sacroiliac impingement, untreated radiculopathy, neurogenic claudication, myofascial pain, compression fractures, disc herniation, osteophytes, rheumatoid arthritis.
